channel.title: Don Moen on UESI SongBook
channel.description: Recent content in Don Moen on UESI SongBook

item.title: Lord You Seem So Far Away
item.description: Lord You seem so far away. A million miles or more it feels today. And though I haven’t lost my faith, I must confess right now that it’s Hard for me to pray. But I don’t know what to say And I don’t know where to start But as you give the grace With all that’s in my heart. I will sing. I will praise Even in my darkest hour
